name: operation, printer, laser, black/white, per kg printed paper | printed paper | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2927/documentation

The laser jet printer use (b/w, office) is calculated via the active mode electricity consumption taken from literature information. The dataset includes the share of the printer production (assumed life span 4 years), the energy consumption for the different modes in the use-phase, the toner usage as well as the benzene emissions for the printing of 1 kg of paper.;Reccomended printing volume for this kind of printer is 20,000 pages/months (http://www.epson.de/de/en/viewcon/corporatesite/products/mainunits/specs/9538). Paper quality assumptions; one sheet of paper weights 5g (80g/m2 as an average printing paper).



Describes the use of a laser jet printer (monochrome) in an office. Calculated per 1 kg of printed paper. Swiss supply mix applied for electricity consumption (low voltage).
category: C:Manufacturing/18:Printing and reproduction of recorded media/181:Printing and service activities related to printing/1811:Printing

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The data is based on information by international printer manufacturers and literature. Due to relatively vague literature data for laser jet printer life span and mode splits, assumptions had to be made.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: No technology involved, except for the production of printer and toner, which are represented in the individual subdatasets.

flow.name: printed paper
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/18:Printing and reproduction of recorded media/181:Printing and service activities related to printing/1811:Printing

exchanges.description:
Calculated based on literature values and estimates. The monthly production volume of this type of printer is 20,000 pg (http://www.epson.de/de/en/viewcon/corporatesite/products/mainunits/specs/9538). The weight of one page is 0.005kg. The lifetime of a printer is estimated to be 4 years. In its lifetime the printer is able to print on (20,000*12*4=) 960,000 pages, of total weight (960,000*0.005=) 4800 kg.
EcoSpold01Location=GLO

exchanges.description: Calculated based on literature and estimates. Toner module capacity is 5000 pages, one page weight 0.005 kg, thus total weight of paper one toner module can print on is (5000*0.005=) 25 kg. In order to print on paper of total weight of 1 kg (1/25=) 0.04 units of toner module is needed.
